description.zh-cn: 清末八国联军侵华时，中国东南各省督抚违抗清廷命令，不与列强开战而私下达成和平协议的事件。
description.en: An event during the late Qing Dynasty when governors-general and governors of southeastern provinces of China defied an imperial edict to declare war on foreign powers during the Boxer Rebellion, instead negotiating a separate peace to keep their provinces out of the conflict.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期的实际统治者，在义和团运动期间向多国宣战，引发八国联军之役，其权威在东南互保事件中受到严重挑战。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the Qing Dynasty in its final decades. She declared war on multiple foreign powers during the Boxer Rebellion, leading to the invasion by the Eight-Nation Alliance. Her authority was severely challenged by the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，淮军创始人和北洋大臣，东南互保的核心人物之一。曾任两广总督。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing Dynasty, founder of the Huai Army, and Viceroy of Zhili. He was one of the key figures in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China, serving as the Viceroy of Liangguang at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，湘军出身，东南互保的核心人物之一。时任两江总督。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing Dynasty with Xiang Army background, one of the key figures in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Viceroy of Liangjiang at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，洋务派代表人物，东南互保的核心人物之一。时任湖广总督。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing Dynasty and a leading figure of the Self-Strengthening Movement, one of the key figures in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Viceroy of Huguang at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，东南互保的参与者之一。时任闽浙总督。
description.en: A late Qing official who participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Viceroy of Min-Zhe at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初的军事和政治人物，东南互保的参与者之一。时任山东巡抚。
description.en: A military and political figure in the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China, a participant in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Governor of Shandong at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，东南互保的参与者之一。时任安徽巡抚。
description.en: A late Qing official who participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Governor of Anhui at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，东南互保的参与者之一。在李鸿章北上议和时代理两广总督。
description.en: A late Qing official who participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He served as the acting Viceroy of Liangguang when Li Hongzhang went north for peace negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员和实业家，东南互保的参与者之一，下令地方电信局扣押清廷的宣战诏书。时任铁路大臣。
description.en: A late Qing official and industrialist who participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He ordered local telegraph offices to withhold the imperial edict of war. He was the Minister of Railways at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，东南互保的支持者。时任陕西巡抚。
description.en: A late Qing official who supported the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Governor of Shaanxi at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，东南互保的支持者。时任四川总督。
description.en: A late Qing official who supported the Mutual Protection of Southeast China. He was the Viceroy of Sichuan at the time.

description.zh-cn: 清末状元、实业家、教育家，曾劝告刘坤一、张之洞等人实行东南互保。
description.en: A scholar, industrialist, and educator of the late Qing Dynasty who advised Liu Kunyi and Zhang Zhidong to initiate the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初著名谋士，曾劝告刘坤一、张之洞等人实行东南互保。
description.en: A famous strategist in the late Qing and early Republican era who advised Liu Kunyi and Zhang Zhidong to initiate the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

description.zh-cn: 李鸿章幕僚，曾奉李鸿章之命联络孙中山，寻求其在广东独立计划中的协助。
description.en: An aide to Li Hongzhang who, on Li's behalf, contacted Sun Yat-sen to seek his assistance in a plan for Guangdong's independence.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，在东南互保期间曾被李鸿章的幕僚联络，商讨广东独立事宜。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary who was contacted by Li Hongzhang's aide during the Mutual Protection of Southeast China to discuss the independence of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 一种国家政体，指国家权力机关和国家元首由选举产生。
description.en: A form of government in which state power is held by the people and their elected representatives.

description.zh-cn: 共和制国家的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state in a republic.

description.zh-cn: 清末大臣，在东南互保后奉命到南方各省收缴财权和兵权，以加强中央集权。
description.en: A minister of the late Qing Dynasty who was sent to the southern provinces after the Mutual Protection of Southeast China to reclaim financial and military power for the central government.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后以光绪帝名义，向十一国发布宣战诏书。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi, in the name of the Guangxu Emperor, issued an imperial edict declaring war on eleven foreign powers.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后发布命令，要求各地督抚支持义和团运动以对抗列强。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi issued orders demanding provincial governors to support the Boxer movement to resist foreign powers.

description.zh-cn: 盛宣怀下令各地电信局将慈禧太后的宣战诏书扣押，只给各地督抚观看，并电告不要服从此命令。
description.en: Sheng Xuanhuai ordered telegraph offices to withhold Empress Dowager Cixi's edict of war, showing it only to the governors-general and governors and advising them by telegraph not to obey the order.

description.zh-cn: 李鸿章以“此乱命也，粤不奉诏”为由，拒绝执行宣战命令。
description.en: Li Hongzhang refused to carry out the order to declare war, stating, 'This is a rebellious order; Guangdong will not obey this edict.'

description.zh-cn: 作为两广总督，李鸿章是发起和参与东南互保的核心人物之一。
description.en: As the Viceroy of Liangguang, Li Hongzhang was one of the key figures who initiated and participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

description.zh-cn: 作为两江总督，刘坤一是发起和参与东南互保的核心人物之一。
description.en: As the Viceroy of Liangjiang, Liu Kunyi was one of the key figures who initiated and participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

description.zh-cn: 作为湖广总督，张之洞是发起和参与东南互保的核心人物之一。
description.en: As the Viceroy of Huguang, Zhang Zhidong was one of the key figures who initiated and participated in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China.

description.zh-cn: 东南互保事件是地方实力派首次公然反抗中央政府，导致清廷威信扫地，中央权威下降。
description.en: The Mutual Protection of Southeast China was the first time regional strongmen openly defied the central government, causing the Qing court to lose its prestige and central authority to decline.

description.zh-cn: 劝告两江总督刘坤一和湖广总督张之洞参与东南互保，倡议抗命。
description.en: Advised Viceroy of Liangjiang Liu Kunyi and Viceroy of Huguang Zhang Zhidong to participate in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China, advocating for defiance of the imperial order.

description.zh-cn: 劝告两江总督刘坤一和湖广总督张之洞参与东南互保，倡议抗命。
description.en: Advised Viceroy of Liangjiang Liu Kunyi and Viceroy of Huguang Zhang Zhidong to participate in the Mutual Protection of Southeast China, advocating for defiance of the imperial order.

description.zh-cn: 张之洞提出“李鸿章大总统”方案，计划在光绪帝和慈禧太后不保的情况下，改制共和，推举李鸿章出任大总统。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong proposed the 'Li Hongzhang for President' plan, which involved establishing a republic and electing Li Hongzhang as president if the Guangxu Emperor and Empress Dowager Cixi were to meet with misfortune.

description.zh-cn: 代表李鸿章联络孙中山，称李鸿章欲使粤省独立，希望得到孙中山的协助。
description.en: Contacted Sun Yat-sen on behalf of Li Hongzhang, stating that Li wished to make Guangdong province independent and sought Sun's assistance.

description.zh-cn: 与张之洞一同邀约各国驻上海领事商订《东南保护约款》。
description.en: Along with Zhang Zhidong, invited foreign consuls in Shanghai to negotiate and conclude the 'Articles for Mutual Protection of the Southeast'.

description.zh-cn: 与刘坤一一同邀约各国驻上海领事商订《东南保护约款》。
description.en: Along with Liu Kunyi, invited foreign consuls in Shanghai to negotiate and conclude the 'Articles for Mutual Protection of the Southeast'.

description.zh-cn: 东南互保事件中地方势力的崛起和中央权威的衰落，为辛亥革命时各省宣布独立铺垫了基础。
description.en: The rise of regional power and the decline of central authority during the Mutual Protection of Southeast China laid the groundwork for the provinces to declare independence during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 李鸿章是淮军的创始人和统帅。
description.en: Li Hongzhang was the founder and commander of the Huai Army.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯系的北洋军阀由淮军发展而来。
description.en: The Beiyang warlords under Yuan Shikai developed from the Huai Army.

description.zh-cn: 铁良前往武昌等地，改编或解散了张之洞创办的勇营武装，以加强中央对地方军事的控制。
description.en: Tieliang traveled to Wuchang and other places to reorganize or disband the 'Yong Ying' forces established by Zhang Zhidong, aiming to strengthen central control over regional military.
